<<<<<<< HEAD
Instructions about right beleeving: severall sermons leading unto Christ, directing unto faith, and incouraging thereto. Shewing the nature, measure, and necessitie of the sense of sinne. Christ the bread of life, a sufficient remedy for mans misery; with the way and meanes to obtain him; as also incouragements to come to him, from his abilitie and readinesse to give full soule-satisfaction. / By John Archer, Master of Art, sometime preacher of All-hallowes Lumbard-street. London. Archer, John, Master of Art.
[4], 77, [3] p.
Printed for Benjamin Allen, and are to be sold at his shop, at the Crown in Popes-head-Alley., London; : 1645.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
